answer_found_by_llm: The source IP address exhibiting scanning behavior is 10.0.0.112 with 10,385 connection attempts.
The city from which the attacker's activities originated is Los Angeles, California, United States.
The open ports detected during the attack include port 8080, which provides access to the web server admin panel.
There were no tools used for directory and file enumeration on the web server.
The attacker attempted to identify administrative interfaces and successfully uncovered the directory /manager/html, which is the Apache Tomcat Manager application.
No, the attacker did not attempt to authenticate to the web server as the credentials were not provided in the network traffic.
I was unable to find any evidence of file upload in the network traffic.
No, there is no evidence of the attacker attempting to establish persistence on the compromised server in the network traffic.
